verbs.description: After [V: meeting] [ARG1: with a top North Korean official] [ARGM-LOC: in the Oval Office] [ARGM-TMP: Friday] , President Donald Trump said the June 12 Singapore summit is back on the calendar
[ARGM-TMP: After meeting with a top North Korean official in the Oval Office Friday] , [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: said] [ARG1: the June 12 Singapore summit is back on the calendar]
After meeting with a top North Korean official in the Oval Office Friday , President Donald Trump said [ARG1: the June 12 Singapore summit] [V: is] [ARG2: back on the calendar]
